official_title: A bill to provide survivors' annuities under chapter 83 of title 5, United States Code, to certain  widows and widowers.

summary.text: Entitles to a civil service retirement annuity any widow or widower of a Federal employee who: (1) died before January 8, 1971; (2) was married to an individual other than the widow or widower at retirement; and (3) elected not to provide for an annuity for his or her surviving spouse.

titles.title: A bill to provide survivors' annuities under chapter 83 of title 5, United States Code, to certain  widows and widowers.
